timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-08-21T08:24:33", "sender_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "recipient_email": "kage_han@hanmail.net", "subject": "Connect on WhatsApp for Quick Booking Assistance \u2013 AmberStudent (UCL Official Accommodation Partner)", "message": "Hi Seunghoe Han,\\n\\nI hope you're doing well.\\n\\nI'm Rishabh from AmberStudent, the official accommodation partner of UCL. To make your booking process quicker and more convenient, you can reach out to us directly on WhatsApp at +44 7460 047271\\n\\nFeel free to message us with any questions or support you need \u2014 we're here to help you find the perfect student accommodation.\\n\\nLooking forward to assisting you!\\n\\nBest regards,\\nRishabh\\nAmberStudent \u2013 Official Accommodation Partner of UCL\\n\\n--\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "Hi Seunghoe Han, I hope you're doing well. I'm Rishabh from AmberStudent, the official accommodation partner of UCL. To make your booking process quicker and more convenient, you can reach out", "direction": "outbound", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "kage_han@hanmail.net"}

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Yeah, hello? Am I speaking with him here?
Speaker B: Sorry. I'm sorry. Actually, I've been a meeting, so can I. Can I take a call? So I.
Speaker A: Will connect you on WhatsApp. Okay. This is regarding your UCL accommodation.
Speaker B: Okay, yeah.
Speaker A: 플래콤 소리샘 서비스입니다. 음성녹음은 1번, 호출번호를 남기시려면 2번을 눌러주세요.
Speaker A: 텔레콤 수리샘 서비스입니다. 음성 녹음은 1번, 호출 번호를 남기시려면.
